original_text: David and his men arrived at Ziklag three days after they left King Achish. They found that the Amalekites had attacked Ziklag and towns in the south of Judah. The Amalekites had destroyed Ziklag with fire. Samuel 29 Samuel 31
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 사람들이 사흘 만에 시글락에 이른 때에 아말렉 사람들이 이미 네겝과 시글락을 침노하였는데 그들이 시글락을 쳐서 불사르고

sentences.original_text: David and his men arrived at Ziklag
three days after they left King Achish
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 아기시 왕을 떠난 지 삼일 후에

sentences.original_text: They found that the Amalekites had attacked Ziklag
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아말렉 사람들이 시글락을 공격했다는 것을 발견했습니다

sentences.original_text: and towns in the south of Judah
The Amalekites had destroyed Ziklag with fire
